title: Automated Radiology Imaging Analysis and Reporting
overview: This project automates the process of analyzing radiology images and generating corresponding radiology reports using AI.

installation.description: Clone the repository and install dependencies.

usage: Follow the instructions in the project to download datasets, explore image data, convert image formats, and generate reports.
api_key_configuration: Insert your OpenAI API key in the designated script area.
project_structure: Scripts for exploring DICOM, TIFF images, and CSV files
Image display and report generation scripts
notes: The reports are for demonstration and should not replace professional medical advice. Ensure data privacy and regulation compliance.
contributing: Contributions are welcome. Please fork the repository and submit a pull request.
